comments.author: GeePeeU
comments.body: The fact this dev team chose the ticker LRC (Which belongs to Loopring) shows they have done very little research in the crypto space. Also, -Has a presale, -Is a token.Be very careful. This seems shady.

comments.author: MetaColonies
comments.body: Â¿What is Luna Red Classic? ğŸš€ğŸš€Luna Red Classic LRC is a brand new reflection protocol on the Binance Smart Chain. This contract will have unique features and will be the first of its kind to introduce reflections to holders with absolutely ZERO taxes and being deflationary.Link: https://presale.lunaredclassic.digital/Twitter: https://twitter.com/LunaRedClassicWeb: https://lunaredclassic.digital/

comments.author: CaVO32
comments.body: Quote from: GeePeeU on May 25, 2022, 12:17:08 PMThe fact this dev team chose the ticker LRC (Which belongs to Loopring) shows they have done very little research in the crypto space. Also, -Has a presale, -Is a token.Be very careful. This seems shady. If I may add also, they are using the LUNA word in their name. Why not create a new name and not use the popular project that recently crashed? Are they taking advantage of the negative publicity of LUNA today? After all, bad publicity is still a publicity. A simple search in coingecko or cmc would come up that another project is already using LRC. So they will have a problem in terms of exchange listing. But that is, if they can even be listed in decent exchanges. So yes, be very cautious on this project.

comments.author: rat03gopoh
comments.body: Quote from: mariconerafa25 on May 27, 2022, 03:42:59 AM3. A Strong Concept.what you rely on is simply "burning" regardless of any allocation and still aiming to reduce supply. an old concept, close to the pump and dump scheme

comments.author: nimogsm
comments.body: Nothing new.We take a similar name, a similar logo and create another token.My advice to the team: before you fully launch the site, make sure that the graphics on us are of decent quality.You also have traces of poor cropping of the picture.This is a trifle, but where there is money, everything should look at least solid.There is also a rush and the work of non-professionals is visible.

comments.author: MetaColonies
comments.body: Luna Red Classic LRC is a brand new reflection protocol on the Binance Smart Chain. This contract will have unique features and will be the first of its kind to introduce reflections to holders with absolutely ZERO taxes and being deflationaryBurning the supply of LRC raises the price floor. Contrary to many mining or staking projects that burn tokens from what they hold outside liquidity, which has no impact on price, our project burns directly from liquidity which results in a raised price. We burn these coins by sending them out of existence; they are not sent to burn wallet of any kind.CONTRACT: 0x1F7BE1392cFa433015708541805f771AF7Fcf0a2web: https://lunaredclassic.digital/ğŸ’Airdrop: 62 LRCğŸ’°Bonus: 10% BNB + 30% LRCPRE-SALE AND LAUNCHÂ -Launch: 30 JUNE

comments.author: MetaColonies
comments.body: CONTRACTUnique contractThe contract will have a unique triggerable community torch. This burn function can be called by anyone from the community. Once a community member lights the torch, the contract automatically burns 1% (% is flexible & can be adjusted accordingly to the chart) of the total liquidity pool. The member that calls this function will be rewarded 1% of the amount that is burnt. The frequency of which this function can be called will be flexible and will change up on the conditions of the chart and the amount of the total supply.Burning the supply of $LRC raises the price floor. Contrary to many mining or staking projects that burn tokens from what they hold outside liquidity, which has no impact on price, our project burns directly from liquidity which results in a raised price. We burn these coins by sending them out of existence; they are not sent to burn wallet of any kind.
